topic.title: Concentrations in Specified Head Boundaries in GWT model

para.text: Concentrations in Specified Head Boundaries in GWT model

Nearly all the specified head boundaries in this model have concentrations of zero. The four that do not are the ones in layers 1 and 2, row 1, columns 12-15 for a total of 8 CHD cells. There are 8 CHD objects - one for each layer. There are several methods that could be used to specify the concentrations at the specified head boundaries. One method would be to split the CHD objects
para.link: as was done with the well boundaries in the CTS model
para.text: . However, there is an easier method of doing it in this case. We will define a new data set named CHD_Conc and use a formula in the two objects defining the CHD boundaries in the top two layers of the model.
First add a new data set in the
dialog box named CHD_Conc. Click the Add button and name the data set. Then click the Apply button.
